软件包 org.epilot.ccf.filter

类摘要
ExecutorFilter A filter that forward events to Executor in backport-util-concurrent.
ExecutorFilter.Event  
ExecutorFilter.EventType  
ExecutorFilterReceive 一个无序线程池, 该池负责将接收到的消息进行解码 默认Executors.newFixedThreadPool(50) 使用该线程要保证每个线程的安全性.
ExecutorFilterReceive.Event  
ExecutorFilterReceive.EventType  
ExecutorFilterSend 一个无序线程池，该池负责将待发送的消息进行编码 默认Executors.newFixedThreadPool(50) 使用该线程要保证每个线程的安全性.
ExecutorFilterSend.Event  
ExecutorFilterSend.EventType  
MessageCodecFilter  
ProtocolCodecFilter An IoFilter which translates binary or protocol specific data into message object and vice versa using ProtocolCodecFactory, ProtocolEncoder, or ProtocolDecoder.
ProtocolCodecFlashFilter An IoFilter which translates binary or protocol specific data into message object and vice versa using ProtocolCodecFactory, ProtocolEncoder, or ProtocolDecoder.
UnorderedExecutorFilter 一个无序线程池,接收到消息立刻将消息放入到线程池中去,默认Executors.newFixedThreadPool(100) 使用该线程要保证每个线程的安全性.
UnorderedExecutorFilter.Event  
UnorderedExecutorFilter.EventType
